data.text: My child is happy at Greenwood High School
My child feels safe at Greenwood High School
Greenwood High School does its best to ensure that my child reaches their potential
Greenwood High School tells me what my child will be learning in the forthcoming term or year
My child has SEND (Special Educational Needs and Disabilities) and the school makes adequate provision for them
There have been a high number of teaching staff changes at Greenwood High School over the last year
Greenwood High School offers clubs and activities during lunchtime, before or after school
Greenwood High School is also helping them learn life skills, such as responsibility
Greenwood High School is consistent in its approach to good behaviour
I am confident that if my child was bullied, Greenwood High School would stop it happening
Greenwood High School makes it easy for me to talk to them if I have a concern
Greenwood High School updates me regularly about how my child is getting on
My child is at boarding school and I am happy with how it looks after the eating and sleeping arrangements for my child.
I would recommend Greenwood High School to another parent
